title: Jonathan Ashworth – 2020 Comments on the Appointment of a Vaccines Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jonathan Ashworth, the Shadow Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 28 November 2020.
content: Only days ago Labour called for a Vaccines Minister to oversee the huge logistical challenge of widespread vaccination.

We now need a mass public health campaign urging uptake of the vaccine, alongside ensuring the resources are in place for GPs and other health professionals to rapidly roll this out as soon as possible.
